Group 2 Mapping from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Slot|5.0.0 to Extensions for Using Data Elements from FHIR R5 in FHIR R4

Slot.serviceType (serviceType)is equivalent tohttp://hl7.org/fhir/5.0/StructureDefinition/extension-Slot.serviceTypeElement `Slot.serviceType` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Slot.serviceType`, but has no comparisons.

name: R5SlotElementMapToR4
title: Cross-version mapping for FHIR R5 Slot to FHIR R4 Slot
description: This ConceptMap represents cross-version mappings for elements from a FHIR R5 Slot to FHIR R4.
